item.description:
911 Truth Leafleting @ Regata where 300,000 people may attend!
The 44th Head of the Charles (Harvard Square Area)
Head Of The Charles Regatta
Details:
The 44th Head Of The Charles Regatta, the world's largest two-day rowing event, brings 7,500 athletes from around the world to compete in 55 different race events. The Regatta attracts up to 300,000 spectators to Harvard Square!

The 44th Head Of The Charles will take place on October 18 & 19, 2008 along the Charles River in Cambridge and Boston. The 3 mile course begins at the Boston Univ. Bridge and ends at Herter Park. Over 6,000 male and female rowers will be competing from all over the world in 21 events with age groups ranging from youth to veteran.

Head Of The Charles Regatta

PO Box 380052
Cambridge, MA 02238
(617) 868-6200
regatta@hocr.org
www.hocr.org
